Model Evaluation

You can evaluate your agent and compare its policy to the fixed adaptive therapy protocols using the evaluate module.

The evaluate module contains the script for the default evaluation configured by the config.yaml file, fixed_at utility function and the Evaluate class.

class physilearning.evaluate.Evaluation(env)[source]
run_AT(num_episodes=1, name='AT', path='./')[source]

Run adaptive therapy for comperison

run_model(model_name, num_episodes=1, path='./', name='model')[source]

Method to run the the environment with the loaded policy Parameters ———- num_episodes: int, number of episoded to run

Returns

save_trajectory(name)[source]

Save the trajectory to a csv file

param: name: name of the file to save the trajectory

physilearning.evaluate.fixed_at(obs, environment, threshold=0.8, at_type='zhang_et_al')[source]

Cycling adaptive therapy strategy, applies treatment only if the tumor burden is above a threshold

Parameters:

  • obs (ndarray) – observation from the environment

  • environment (LvEnv) – environment

  • threshold (float) – threshold for the tumor burden

  • at_type (str) – type of adaptive therapy strategy

Return type:

int

Returns:

action
